title: Proposal: Changes to SushiSwap liquidity mining program
body:
* **(OPTION 1)** Distribute 20’000 $OPIUM per week via DROPIUM

* **(OPTION 2)** Distribute 20’000 $OPIUM per week via DROPIUM + migrate SushiSwap liquidity mining program to double farming on SushiSwap Onsen once it’s negotiated

* **(OPTION 3)** Decrease the rewards to 10’000 $OPIUM per week in favour of other liquidity mining programs

* **(OPTION 4)** Decrease the rewards to 10’000 $OPIUM per week in favour of other liquidity mining programs + migrate SushiSwap liquidity mining program to double farming on SushiSwap Onsen once it’s negotiated

Read full proposal and discussion on the governance forum
https://forum.opium.network/t/proposal-changes-to-sushiswap-liquidity-mining-program/206
author: 0x84E94F8032b3F9fEc34EE05F192Ad57003337988
